translations: n.[植] 种脊，脊；[解剖] 缝

sentences.sentence: Nucleus raphe dorsalis (RD) plays an important role in acupuncture analgesia.
sentences.translation: 中缝背核在针剌镇痛过程中起重要作用。

sentences.sentence: Small facial haemangioma and supraumbilical raphe- A forme fruste of PHACES syndrome?
sentences.translation: 面部小血管瘤及脐上裂——PHACES综合征的顿挫型?。

sentences.sentence: This study provides the first evidence of raphe SOM innervation of the pharyngeal premotor neurons.
sentences.translation: 首次证明了大鼠中缝核群中SOM样神经元对咽肌前运动神经元的支配。
